question: In what time will 1860 Rs. amount to 2641.20 at simple interest 12% per annum ?
explanation:
SI = 2641.20 - 1860 = 781.2 Rs. 
$latex Time = \\frac{SI\\times 100}{Princ.\\times Rate}&s=1$
$latex = \\frac{781.2\\times 100}{1860\\times 12} = 3.5 = 3\\frac{1}{2}\\ years&s=1$
Hence option [B] is correct answer.
